page.title: 03THE FARQUHARSON FAMILY.
page.content: As far back as 1382 one of the clan was raiding the Forest of Birse but land was not acquired until 1579 when{Donald Farquharson}purchased Tillygarmont. He was the son of Finlay More,killed at the Battle of Pinkie, bearing the Scottish standard. The second{Donald,of Tillygarmont}, was killed in Aberdeen in 1645.His nephew built Finzean House in 1686. In 1708 Finzean was made a barony by Queen Anne and the lands gradually increased to over 40,000 acres by 1820.The family is now represented by Alison Mary Farquharson,the 15th Farquharson of Finzean.Her son {Donald's}coming of age is being celebrated in Finzean Hall this year. Will his descendants inherit the still almost intact barony 100 years on?
